sqlMap.select: select t.* from location_config t where t.parentid!=0 and t.parentid is not null
select t.* from location_config t where t.parentid = #parentid#
select t.* from location_config t where t.parentid = 0 and t.parentid is not null
select t.* from location_config t where t.locationid = #id#
select max(t.locationid)+1 from location_config t where t.parentid=#parentid#
select max(t.locationid)+1 from location_config t where t.parentid=0
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT LOCATION_CONFIG_SEQUEN.NEXTVAL AS locationId FROM dual
insert into location_config (LOCATIONID,LOCATIONLEVEL,LOCATIONNAME,PARENTID) values(#locationId#,#locationLevel#,#locationName#,#parentId#)
sqlMap.update: update location_config set LOCATIONLEVEL=#locationLevel#, LOCATIONNAME=#locationName#, PARENTID=#parentId# where LOCATIONID=#locationId#
sqlMap.delete: delete from location_config a where a.locationid=#locationId# or a.parentId=#locationId#
sqlMap.select: select a.labellevel from label_config a group by a.labellevel
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT label_config_sequen.nextval AS labelId FROM dual
insert into label_config (labelId, labelLevel, labelName, matchKeywords, parentId) values (#labelId#, #labelLevel#, #labelName#, #matchKeywords#, #parentId#)
sqlMap.update: update label_config set labelLevel=#labelLevel#, labelName=#labelName#, matchKeywords=#matchKeywords#, parentId=#parentId# where labelId=#labelId#
sqlMap.delete: delete from label_config a where a.labelid=#labelId# or a.parentid=#labelId#
